heroes.name: Fafner
heroes.trait: Nagas - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Nagas or Naga Queens for each level attained after 6th level

heroes.name: Iona
heroes.trait: Genies - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Genies or Master Genies for each level attained after 5th level

heroes.name: Josephine
heroes.trait: Golems - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Stone or Iron Golems for each level attained after 3rd level

heroes.name: Neela
heroes.trait: Armorer - Receives a 5% per level bonus to Armorer skill percentage

heroes.name: Piquedram
heroes.trait: Gargoyles - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Stone or Obsidian Gargoyles for each level attained after 2nd level

heroes.name: Thane
heroes.trait: Genies - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Genies or Master Genies for each level attained after 5th level

heroes.name: Torosar
heroes.trait: Ballista - Increases the Attack and Defense skill of any Ballista for each level attained after 4th level

heroes.name: Astral
heroes.trait: Hypnotize - Casts Hypnotize with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit (the bonus is greater when used on weaker units)

heroes.name: Cyra
heroes.trait: Haste - Casts Haste with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit (the bonus is greater when used on weaker units)

heroes.name: Daremyth
heroes.trait: Fortune - Casts Fortune with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit (the bonus is greater when used on weaker units)

heroes.name: Halon
heroes.trait: Mysticism - Receives a 5% per level bonus to Mysticism skill percentage

heroes.name: Serena
heroes.trait: Eagle Eye - Receives a 5% per level bonus to Eagle Eye skill percentage

heroes.name: Solmyr
heroes.trait: Chain Lightning - Casts Chain Lightning with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit (the bonus is greater when used on weaker units)

heroes.name: Theodorus
heroes.trait: Mages - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Mages or Archmages for each level attained after 4th level
